requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600 @ 3.2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, GTX 970, AMD RX 480 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: By feedbacks of our players AMD systems having issues in graphical optimizations, since Unreal Engine works better at Nvidia and Intel systems and AMD requirements may be higher
